SEARCH
Package src.model

Class FeedbackAnalytics

java.lang.Object
src.model.FeedbackAnalytics
public class FeedbackAnalytics extends Object
Provides analytics and breakdowns on a list of feedback. Includes counts, filters, and grouping logic.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new FeedbackAnalytics instance.

    Returns the total number of feedback entries.

    Returns the number of feedback entries that are still pending.
    List<Feedback>
    getFeedbackByManager(HDBManager manager)
    Filters feedback to only include those related to a manager’s assigned project.
    Map<String,Long>
    groupByApplicant()
    Groups feedback by applicant NRIC and returns the number of submissions per applicant.

    Groups feedback by their status (e.g., PENDING, RESOLVED).

  • Method Details

    • getFeedbackByManager

      public List<Feedback> getFeedbackByManager(HDBManager manager)
      Filters feedback to only include those related to a manager’s assigned project.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager to filter by.
      Returns:
      Feedback list belonging to that project.

    • countTotal

      public long countTotal()
      Returns the total number of feedback entries.

    • countUnresolved

      public long countUnresolved()
      Returns the number of feedback entries that are still pending.

    • groupByStatus

      public Map<String,Long> groupByStatus()
      Groups feedback by their status (e.g., PENDING, RESOLVED).
      Returns:
      Map of status strings to their corresponding count.

    • groupByApplicant

      public Map<String,Long> groupByApplicant()
      Groups feedback by applicant NRIC and returns the number of submissions per applicant.
      Returns:
      Map where key is applicant NRIC, value is number of feedbacks.
